post.body: Happy Birthday man!
hahaha....no. my work windows machine does though
love the icon
Right tool? All I have is a hammer and everything I see is glass
Oh, I thought you were ditching Fusion for Parallels
why the switch back to Parallels?
what about it is making it fun?
ftw!
what you need is something that will autocreate the sprites and the css for you. I need to get back to working on that
I did and it's not that bad. Now the outlet malls are insane
I like Twinkle. You can see who is around you that's tweeting
When will we all have the Christmas Pink Dragon party? hint: you can never unwrap the dragon.
the answer is quite easy: I'm drinking diet soda so I can splurge on that extra Big Mac.
damn you. that song gives me trouble
The Christmas tree is up
i hate when "restart your computer 3 times" actually works.
Bah....Netflix isn't letting me activate my Xbox >_<
The new Google iPhone app is pretty dope. Voice recognization FTW! Just have to figure out how to make it search my contacts
I got Hulu playing through my Xbox via PlayOn. FTW!
Downtown at the Farmer's Market
I want to be allowed to just make tools all day
The Presidential Shocker: http://www.whitehouse.gov/news/releases/2008/11/images/20081112_d-0077-5-515h.html
a todo for me: create a tool that will make some css and a sprite based off of a directory of images. that would be nice
got my hands on Mirror's Edge
retweet: Sorry, but if you need this you shouldn't be trying to get paid to build layouts: http://giveupandusetables.com/
I hate the "Quick Search" in Synaptic Package Manager #ubuntu
A follow-up to yesterday's delicious treat: http://tinyurl.com/6pnd93
mmmmm... http://tinyurl.com/6l366y
Netbeans...I want to like you, I really do. Do you have to use up that much memory on my machine? Really?
Going out to dinner with the wife
I think I have successfully written some horrible code trying to do function pointers in java
Only when I use Java do I come up with 1001 ways that I want to use functional programming. Oh curring, why must we be away
Merry Christmas
Getting something to drink at the Clubhouse
Making travel plans to Japan
If your excuse for holiday shopping is "to help the economy", go ahead and throw in a "or the terrorists win" to the end of that
